mapper.select: select * from board order by no desc
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_BOARD.nextval as no from dual
insert into board values(#{no}, #{title},#{content},#{count},#{writer},sysdate,sysdate)

insert into t_file (no, b_no, file_name, file_path, file_size, reg_date, edit_date, delete_yn)
(SELECT SEQ_FILE.nextval, a.* FROM
( SELECT #{item.b_no} as b_no, #{item.file_name} as file_name, #{item.file_path} as file_path, #{item.file_size} as file_size, sysdate as reg_date, sysdate as edit_date, 'N' as delete_yn FROM dual ) a )
mapper.select: select no,b_no,file_name, ceil(file_size/1024) as file_size from t_file where b_no=#{no} and delete_yn='N'
